alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lawrence County through 500 PM MDT... At 425 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bridal Veil Falls, or 5 miles south of Spearfish. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... southern Spearfish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
